column1: #Text=Kai says : " I can fly up on my bison to help her . "
#Text=Lin says : " You 'd never be able to keep up with Zaheer .
#Text=" Bumi says : " How can he fly like that ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " He 's unlocked powers of airbending that have n't existed for thousands of years .
#Text=" Jinora says : " There have n't been this many airbenders in one place for a long time either .
#Text=" Mako says : " You have no water .
#Text=" Ming - Hua says : " Now it 's over !
#Text=" Ghazan says : " I 'm never going back to prison .
#Text=If I 'm going down today , you 're coming with me !
#Text=" Zaheer says : " The poison has done its work .
#Text=The Avatar Cycle will be over momentarily .
#Text=" Lin says : " What are you laughing about ?
#Text=The poison has been in her system too long .
#Text=" Jinora says : " You can save her !
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I 'm here for you .
#Text=I 'm never gon na let you go .
#Text=Chaos is the natural order of - " Bolin says : " See what I did there ?
#Text=I put a sock in him , literally .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I do what I do .
